text: The card displays all voting events that match selected criteria. When comparing parliamentary groups it calculates the majority vote by counting the number of votes for each option and chose the one with the highest number of votes.
Results are displayed in three ways:
list: as a list of all voting events,
as a line chart that shows the number of votes on any given day,
as a histogram showing sums of votes based on working bodies.

comparator-text: I want to know, when {same} voted the same, but {different} voted differently. {load}
comparator-vote-percent: {num} filtered voting events represents {percent} of all voting events.
select-parties-people: Select parliamentary groups or add individual MPs.
empty-state-text: To view voting events add at least two agents.
